title: Lifeblood: The Last Vampires Of Hollywood
description: After wandering the earth for six hundred years, a group of vampires arrives in the last great western town, Hollywood in 1927, the year before the first Academy Awards. They infiltrate the growing movie business becoming producers and directors. For the next seventy years there are strange and unsolved disappearances. Some old time stuntmen have suspicions but no proof.In 1998 Greg Delacroix, a detective in Hollywood and a great nephew of one of the old timers is investigating a murder disappearance. He recalls seeing an old newspaper clipping hidden in the family album left by his uncle Ned concerning a past murder. It's the clue needed to track down the killers. What he discovers is a mystery spanning decades and countries involving many characters. This is the first in a two book series. Dragan Radelescu And The Vampires of Paris picks up the story when this one ends and gives a back story that begins during the French Revolution.
author: Shamus Sherwood
